programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A fellow detective asks the SVU for help when he suspects his two daughters are being groomed by a serial predator; Kat disobeys the captain's orders.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A desperate father takes matters into his own hands in the case against his daughter's rapist.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU squad searches for Detective Benson and her abductor (Pablo Schreiber).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 7-year-old girl escapes from her rapist, detectives Benson and Stabler begin an intensive search for the predator.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The life of a law-abiding engineer (Robin Williams) goes terribly wrong, leading him to challenge authority and to urge others to do so as well.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a missing 5-year-old boy is found dead, suspicion falls on his unstable 13-year-old neighbor, whose mental problems began after he was abused at a camp recommended by the dead child's father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler suspect the drug-dealing uncle of a girl (Shareeka Epps) found raped and beaten, but the theft of the rape kit identifying her attacker leads them to a crooked prison guard.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Elliot Stabler puts his marriage at risk when he goes under cover to gain access to an animal-smuggling ring, with Olivia posing as a prostitute.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler help a repeat rape victim (Jennifer Love Hewitt) stand up to her attacker; the investigation leads Benson to Los Angeles, where she meets a detective (Skeet Ulrich) with information that could help the victim get justice.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Burgess and Atwater come across a gunshot victim and the only witness is Olinsky's daughter; Ruzek goes to Burgess for help with an undercover mission.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Dueling gangs are suspected when a massacre occurs and $8 million is stolen; Platt asks Ruzek for help.

programme.desc: As Voight and his team search for the bombers, they realize there might be more bombs set to detonate; Burgess' niece fights for her life.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Cmdr. Perry notifies the unit that Pulpo has been released to help with a case; Ruzek gets difficult news; when a bit of Lindsay's past resurfaces, Voight reminds her how far she's come.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Platt and Voight discuss their pasts; Jin uses a scapegoat when he is caught tinkering with Voight's computer; Lindsay realizes she needs to come clean.

programme.desc: When Severide's father (Treat Williams) visits, he clashes with Chief Boden over a former colleague's death; Shay makes a decision about Clarice; the mystery about Herrmann, Otis and Dawson's bar is revealed.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Mills questions Bennie about the fire that killed Mills' father; Casey, Severide and Bennie investigate two mysterious diner fires.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A failed rescue attempt deeply affects the men and women of firehouse 51; Dawson and Shay deal with a junkie's crazy behavior during a call; the team upsets local drug dealers.

programme.desc: A paramedic candidate joins Shay and Dawson for a few shifts; Cindy Herrmann experiences pregnancy complications while her husband is out of town; Casey receives an unexpected visit.

programme.desc: A teen named Eric admits to looking at a Web site in an attempt to curb pedophilic urges toward his stepbrother; when Eric goes missing, the stepfather (Tom Noonan) is questioned.

programme.desc: Benson and Stabler begin to question the story of a missing teenager (Ellen Woglom) who returns home after four years, claiming to have been kept as a sex slave in a concrete cell.
